description: This file defines the NotesListFragment class for an Android application, responsible for displaying a list of notes, handling search filtering, navigation to note editing, and delete actions with undo functionality.

classes.name: NotesListFragment
classes.description: Android Fragment subclass that manages the UI for displaying, searching, adding, editing, and deleting notes.
